name: One Heart Hero
description:
Play as a knight who triples his attack power at low health, but at the extra cost of mobility.

Bust through doors at low health.

Drop bombs to solve puzzles and break doors.

Can you escape and collect all the gems?

Climb ladders, but only at high health.

Controls:

Move - WASD/Left Control Stick

Jump - Space/South Button

Attack - X/West Button

Bomb - Q/ East Button

Heal - Hold Left Shift/North Button (When you have a gem)

Please note that some mechanics may appear to be bugs. While there are probably bugs since this is our first game, one was turned into a major mechanic. Ideally, you will figure this out on your own, but if you get stuck, see below.

***SPOILERS***

To solve many puzzles, you'll need to jump and drop a bomb below you, then land on the bomb and push it through the tile beneath you.
